attributes.action: Stop the Sun newspaper from trading
attributes.additional_details: The front page of the sun newspaper reported that: some fans picked pockets of the victims. • some dans urinated on the brave cops. • some fans beat up cop giving the kiss of life.
attributes.background: On the 15th of April 1989 96 people lost their lives and a further 766 where injured. The newspaper reported on the event telling many lies for no reason, slandering the characters of men, women and children from the city in what was an unfounded attack.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. The press are operationally and editorially independent of both the UK Government and Parliament.
